doc.title: Global settings
doc.excludeDomains: Wedzera mazita emadomasi kuti arege kubatanidzwa.

example.domain: Unogona kuwedzera zita redomeini, sekuti {{url}}, kusasanganisa zita redomeini rese.
example.url: Unogona kusabatanidza mamwe malink nekuwedzera chinongedzo, senge {{url}}.
example.glob: Unogona kuwedzera {{glob}} patani, senge {{minimatch}}, kuitira kuenzanisa kusinganzwisisike.

doc.script: Iwe unogona zvakare kushandisa js zvinyorwa kuti uwane zvakanyanya kuomarara kutonga.
doc.checkedUseScript: Ungave uchigonesa script yako, ziva kuti unofanirwa kutarisa mabhokisi ese ari maviri panguva imwe chete kuti script ishande.

example1.commentTitle: Parizvino pawebhusaiti ye{{youtube}}, unofanira kuvhura {{youtube}}'s {{watch}} kana {{shorts}} peji mune imwe tab itsva.
example1.page: : Musiyano ndicho chinhu cheURL chepeji yewebhu yazvino, Ndapota ona
example1.pageHost: : The domain name of the current web page
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Iro zita renzvimbo imwe cheteyo. familySubDomain}} saka mazita enzvimbo dzavo akasiyana.
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} nzira yekuenzanisa, uchishandisa {{minimatch}} raibhurari, nzira yekushandisa Ndapota Ona, kana kuti unogona kutsvaga mashandisirwo e{{glob}}.
example1.rightTab: : Iyo link inovhura mune nyowani tab kurudyi
example1.wholeCode: Zvinorehwa nekodhi yese ndezvekuti parizvino muYouTube {{www}} zita rezita rezita, kana chinongedzo chadzvanywa chiri chimwechete chezita uye nzira inotanga na{{watch}} kana {{shorts}}, ipapo tebhu itsva. peji kurudyi ichava Vhura.
